definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: Who cut the strings, so Duanchang impact of the song.
sentences.chinese: 是誰剪斷了琴絃，彈着如此斷腸的曲。

sentences.english: Jack then has Lauren break his handcuffs with a pair of bolt cutters.
sentences.chinese: 然後，傑克指令蘿倫用一把斷線鉗剪斷了他的手銬。

sentences.english: When PUPU was born he cut his own umbilical cord.
sentences.chinese: 噗噗出生的時候自己剪斷了臍帶。

sentences.english: It is also kind of fun to see what happens when you cut the band.
sentences.chinese: 把莫比而斯帶子剪斷，發生的事情同樣有趣。

sentences.english: Don't worry, I stay with you till you cutted it.
sentences.chinese: 不用擔心啦，直到你剪斷爲止我會在這陪着你的。

sentences.english: Cut the thread leaving a small tail.
sentences.chinese: 留一小段的線，然後剪斷。

sentences.english: It is then snipped into even smaller chunks, ready for the complex chemical process to begin.
sentences.chinese: 然後剪斷成更小的塊，準備開始複雜的化學過程。

sentences.english: Note that the peg is 'sheared' from the subsurface gate in tile process.
sentences.chinese: 注意在這個過程中柱銷和潛伏式澆口之間被剪斷。

sentences.english: He snipped the string and untied the parcel.
People were clapping and cheering and catching the locks of hair.
sentences.chinese: 人們在鼓掌，歡呼，去接住被剪斷的髮絲。

sentences.english: It's pneumatic system act the thread- snipping and lube spray.
sentences.chinese: 其供氣系統實現線辮剪斷和油霧潤滑的噴射。

sentences.english: The seamstress cut off the dangling strands of thread.
sentences.chinese: 女裁縫師剪斷垂擺下來的一條線。

sentences.english: Don't cut the string, untie the knots.
Remember, we have shears that cut through bone in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 記住，我們廚房有可以剪斷骨頭的大剪刀。

sentences.english: Try any sleight of hand with my money and I'll cut your throat.
sentences.chinese: 敢對我的錢耍什麼花招的話，我就剪斷你的喉嚨。

sentences.english: Learn how to snip loose strings on an applique in this free video on making an applique.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在這個自由剪斷視頻上作出貼花貼花松弦。

definition: silver needle (fine needle used in acupuncture)
to break the door down and enter (idiom)
(of a guitar, kite etc) to have a string break/(of a tradition etc) to be discontinued/(telephone or Internet connection) disconnected/cut off
